lines.text:
[speaking rapidly, pointing gun into mirror]
You laughin' at me, huh? Huh? You laughin' at m- What am I, a clown? Do I amuse you? I'm what, I'm funny now? Huh? You must be laughin' at me; I don't see anybody else around here!
You're mixing your movies, dipshit.
What?
You're mixing your movies.
No I'm not.

[back to mirror]
How the *fuck* do I amuse you, huh?
That's Joe Pesci.
No, Pesci wasn't in Taxi Driver.
That's what i'm saying. You're mixing your movies.
No I'm not.

[disgusted]
Whatever.
"Whatever." Good response; I guess you win.
Y'know guns are what made this country great. Don't you agree?
[noncomittal shrug]
C'mon. Feel one.
Well... I'd rather not; I don't believe in guns.
Well ya know, you don't know what it's like until you... you touch the love shaft of Mr. Smith and Mr. Wesson.
Actually, being a girl, it's all right for me not to be into guns.
Whatdya mean, "being a girl"? That's all the more reason ya need one - all these crazies in the streets! You wanna be raped?
[instantly shakes head rapidly]
No. Then you carry a gun.
Hey, I got one for ya. If you had to blow some guy, who would it be?
Excuse me?
Say you have to blow some guy, who would you pick?
I don't have to blow some guy.
Yeah I know you don't have to, but if you did, who would it be?
I try not to entertain that thought, and I don't think it's healthy when you do it.
C'mon, entertain it for a second; they got a gun to your head.
Well, if they got a gun to my head, odds are I'll be blowin' one of them.
You're missing my point.
Your point? I didn't realize there was a point.
Forget about it. All right?
Nah- All right. Who are they - friends of yours?
No.
This doesn't make any sense.
I don't know. Look, they're just guys, all right? They're like bored frat guys, they're out on a drinking binge looking for something to do, and somebody gave 'em a gun.
I give up. Who do I want to blow?
I dunno.
See? Neither do I.
[first lines]
I need ta... grab 'em in the first minute.
I still don't see how renting is funny.
Well it's not funny. It's cheating.
But funny and cheating are synonyms
Whatever.
"Whatever." Good response; I guess you win.
[last lines]

[counting cash from Uncle Lou]
I think he might be short.
It's all there! It's all there.

[rapid]
Wait a minute wait a minute wait a minute.
Are you... a little short.
